page.title: 15FASHION IN THE EIGHTIES
page.content: {Flying-suits}are all the fashion. They are all-in-one suits for ladies and teenage girls.They have a zip or buttons all down the front and they are normally baggy. They are in very bright colours this year (1985) such as brilliant jade-green scarlet or blue. All the fashion garments this year have been big in that they have to look several sizes larger than the correct one.People who are older than teenagers have disliked these fashions because they say they are 'not smart'. {Trousers}are still very popular also blue-denim jeans.Ladies of all shapes and sizes wear trousers. {Shoes}have four-inch stiletto heels which make the girls very tall.
